title: Enable auto-confirmation for verified judges
description: Your judge confirmation process takes 2-3 days on average. Enable auto-confirmation for judges with 5+ successful events to save 48 hours per event.

title: Implement automated participant reminders
description: Send automated reminders 48h and 24h before events to reduce no-shows by 30%.

title: Enable escrow auto-release on milestone completion
description: Manual escrow releases are causing 5-7 day delays. Enable auto-release when all parties confirm milestone completion.

title: Automate document expiry tracking
description: You have 12 expired documents in the system. Enable auto-tracking and notifications 30 days before expiry.

title: Enable automated monthly reports
description: Generate and send monthly performance reports automatically to clients.
